#include <iostream>
#include <cstdio>
#include <algorithm>
#include <cstring>
#include <string>
#include <cctype>
#include <stack>
#include <queue>
#include <list>
#include <vector>
#include <map>
#include <sstream>
#include <cmath>
#include <bitset>
#include <utility>
#include <set>
#define INT_MAX 2147483647
#define INT_MIN -2147483648
#define pi acos(-1.0)
#define N 1000000
#define LL long long
using namespace std;

int main ()
{
    int testCase;
    scanf ("%d", &testCase);

    while ( testCase-- ) {
        string first, second;
        cin >> first >> second;

        sort (first.begin (), first.end ());
        sort (second.begin (), second.end ());

        if ( first == second ) printf ("YES\n");
        else printf ("NO\n");
    }

	return 0;
}
